EXPLANATION.SOURCE_SUBJECTS_DIR: location; folder that has the raw MRIs of the subjects in archived or non-archived format
EXPLANATION.SOURCE_BIDS_DIR: location; path to the folder that, if NOT blank, pipeline will convert SOURCE_SUBJECTS_DIR to BIDS format
EXPLANATION.PROCESSED_FS_DIR: location; path to the folder that has the archived data processed with FreeSurfer
EXPLANATION.PROCESSED_FS_DIR_error: location; path to the folder that has the archived data processed with FreeSurfer but had error during processing
EXPLANATION.STATS_DIR: location; path to store the statistical results
EXPLANATION.GLM_file_group: PATH to the file.csv or file.xlsx that has the subjects, groups and variables for statistical analyis
EXPLANATION.id_col: name of the column in the file.csv that includes the names of the subjects similar to the names in PROCESSED_FS_DIR
EXPLANATION.group_col: name of the column in the file.csv that includes the groups
EXPLANATION.variables_for_glm: list of variables from the columns in file.csv file for statistical analysis, FreeSurfer GLM and correlations
EXPLANATION.LOCATION: list of local or remote environments where data is stored
